level.text: Each bid shall be based upon specifications contained in the IFB.
Each bid shall be typewritten or written legibly in ink.
Each erasure or alteration shall be initialed by the signer in ink.
Each bid, except a telegraphic bid, shall be signed in ink.
Each bid, except a telegraphic bid, shall be submitted in an envelope that clearly indicates that it contains a bid and identifies the IFB.
